Title: DocumentSpace
Description: Basic open source VB.Net/Silverlight 4 Tabbed Interface Word Processor.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Basic open source VB.Net/Silverlight 4 Tabbed Interface Word Processor.

supports basic editing commands like cut, copy, paste and select all.

Also supports formatting commands like Bold, Italic, and Underline.

Open/save xaml documents from/to disk.

DocumentSpace also supports Out-of-Browser mode, Click here for more info about Out-of-Browser mode.

Try Demo
